com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.common

Class LogsReplicationConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.common.LogsReplicationConfiguration

  • public final class LogsReplicationConfiguration
extends Object
    Class responsible for providing some default configuration for logs replication.

      • DEFAULT_CONNECTION_MANAGER_BIND_ADDRESS

        public static final String DEFAULT_CONNECTION_MANAGER_BIND_ADDRESS
        The default connection manager bind address. The value is empty which means the connection manager will listen on all addresses. The address the remote replication server receives will be the first active address which is not the loopback adapter.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_SOCKET_SEND_BUFFER_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_SOCKET_SEND_BUFFER_SIZE
        The default socket sent buffer size. 0 means use the platform default socket send size.
        See Also:
